document.full_text: u.s. job openings in february were the most in nearly 2-1/2 years, a government report showed on wednesday, indicating an improvement in labor market conditions.
document.title: february job openings highest in nearly 2-1/2 years
lines_and_colors: u.s. job openings in february were the most in nearly 2-1/2 years, a government report showed on wednesday, indicating an improvement in labor market conditions.
